1.name: It's a Wonderful Life
1.description: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.

2.name: My Darling Clementine
2.description: The Earps battle the Clantons at the OK Corral in Tombstone, Arizona.

3.name: Notorious
3.description: A woman is asked to spy on a group of Nazi friends in South America. How far will she have to go to ingratiate herself with them?

4.name: The Big Sleep
4.description: Private detective Philip Marlowe is hired by a rich family. Before the complex case is over, he's seen murder, blackmail, and what might be love.

5.name: Song of the South
5.description: The kindly story-teller Uncle Remus tells a young boy stories about trickster Br'er Rabbit, who outwits Br'er Fox and slow-witted Br'er Bear.

6.name: The Best Years of Our Lives
6.description: Three World War II veterans return home to small-town America to discover that they and their families have been irreparably changed.

7.name: Great Expectations
7.description: A humble orphan suddenly becomes a gentleman with the help of an unknown benefactor.

8.name: The Stranger
8.description: An investigator from the War Crimes Commission travels to Connecticut to find an infamous Nazi.

9.name: Gilda
9.description: A small-time gambler hired to work in a Buenos Aires casino learns that his ex-lover is married to his employer.

10.name: The Killers
10.description: Hit men kill an unresisting victim, and investigator Reardon uncovers his past involvement with beautiful, deadly Kitty Collins.

11.name: Lady in the Lake
11.description: The lady editor of a crime magazine hires Philip Marlowe to find the wife of her boss. The private detective soon finds himself involved in murder.

12.name: So Dark the Night
12.description: A renowned and relentless Paris detective takes his first vacation in eleven years at a small inn in the French countryside. There he meets and falls in love with the hotelier's daughter, ...                See full summary »

13.name: The Strange Love of Martha Ivers
13.description: A man is reunited with his childhood friend and her husband, who believe he knows the truth about the death of her rich aunt years earlier.

14.name: The Postman Always Rings Twice
14.description: A married woman and a drifter fall in love, then plot to murder her husband.

15.name: Duel in the Sun
15.description: Beautiful half-breed Pearl Chavez becomes the ward of her dead father's first love and finds herself torn between her sons, one good and the other bad.

16.name: Beauty and the Beast
16.description: A beautiful young woman takes her father's place as the prisoner of a mysterious beast, who wishes to marry her.

17.name: A Matter of Life and Death
17.description: A British wartime aviator who cheats death must argue for his life before a celestial court.

18.name: The Razor's Edge
18.description: An adventuresome young man goes off to find himself and loses his socialite fiancée in the process. But when he returns 10 years later, she will stop at nothing to get him back, even though she is already married.

19.name: Nobody Lives Forever
19.description: G.I. Nick Blake, a never charged con man in his pre-military life, has just received an honorable discharge from the army on medical reasons. Rather than return to his old life, he plans to...                See full summary »

20.name: Decoy
20.description: A mortally wounded female gangster recounts how she and her gang revived an executed killer from the gas chamber, to try and find out where he buried a fortune in cash.

21.name: Night Boat to Dublin
21.description: The allies plan to rescue a Swedish atomic scientist from under the noses of the Nazis.

22.name: Terror by Night
22.description: When the fabled Star of Rhodesia diamond is stolen on a London to Edinburgh train and the son of its owner is murdered, Sherlock Holmes must discover which of his suspicious fellow passengers is responsible.

23.name: Dragonwyck
23.description: A simple Connecticut farm girl is recruited by a distant relative, an aristocratic patroon, to be governess to his young daughter in his Hudson Valley mansion.

24.name: Till the Clouds Roll By
24.description: Biography of songwriter, Broadway pioneer, Jerome Kern. Unable to find immediate success in the USA, Kern sought recognition abroad. He journeyed to England where his dreams of success became real and where he met his future wife Eva.

25.name: The Yearling
25.description: A boy persuades his parents to allow him to adopt a young deer, but what will happen if the deer misbehaves?

26.name: The Harvey Girls
26.description: On a train trip West to become a mail-order bride, Susan Bradley meets a cheery crew of young women travelling out to open a " Harvey House " restaurant at a remote whistle-stop.

27.name: Paisan
27.description: The language barrier has tragic consequences in a series of unrelated stories set during the Italian Campaign of WWII.

28.name: Cloak and Dagger
28.description: In WW2, the Allies race against time to persuade two nuclear scientists working for the Germans to switch sides.

29.name: The Spiral Staircase
29.description: In 1916, a shadowy serial killer is targeting women with "afflictions"; one night during a thunderstorm, the mute Helen feels menaced.

30.name: Dressed to Kill
30.description: Sherlock Holmes sets out to discover why a trio of murderous villains, including a dangerously attractive female, are desperate to obtain three unassuming and inexpensive little music boxes.

31.name: The Strange Woman
31.description: In 1820s New England beautiful but poor and manipulative Jenny Hager marries rich old man Isaiah Poster but also seduces his son and his company foreman.

32.name: Shoeshine
32.description: Two shoeshine boys in postwar Rome, Italy, save up to buy a horse, but their involvement as dupes in a burglary lands them in juvenile prison where the experience take a devastating toll on their friendship.

33.name: The Blue Dahlia
33.description: An ex-bomber pilot is suspected of murdering his unfaithful wife.

34.name: Enamorada
34.description: During the Mexican Revolution, a macho rebel general falls in love with the independent-minded daughter of an aristocrat in the town he is occupying.

35.name: The Dark Mirror
35.description: A man is found murdered, with witnesses convinced about the woman they saw leaving his apartment. However, it becomes apparent that the woman has a twin, and finding out which one is the killer seems impossible.

36.name: Cluny Brown
36.description: A free-spirited parlor maid and a Czech refugee surprise an English village with their unconventional ways.

37.name: The Dark Corner
37.description: Secretary tries to help her boss, who is framed for a murder.

38.name: To Each His Own
38.description: An unwed mother, forced to give up her child to avoid scandal, follows her son's life from afar even as she prospers in business.

39.name: Anna and the King of Siam
39.description: In 1862, a young Englishwoman becomes royal tutor in Siam and befriends the King.

40.name: Night and Day
40.description: A fictionalized biopic of composer Cole Porter from his days at Yale in the 1910s through the height of his success to the 1940s.

41.name: Make Mine Music
41.description: Animation done to contemporary popular music.

42.name: A Night in Casablanca
42.description: The Marx Brothers are employed at a hotel in postwar Casablanca, where a ring of Nazis is trying to recover a cache of stolen treasure.

43.name: The Trap
43.description: When a troupe of showgirls with their impresario and press agent vacation at a Malibu Beach resort, two of them are garroted. Charlie takes on the case assisted by Number Two Son Jimmy and faithful chauffeur Birmingham Brown.

44.name: The Time of Their Lives
44.description: Two ghosts who were mistakenly branded as traitors during the Revolutionary War return to 20th century New England to retrieve a letter from George Washington which would prove their ...                See full summary »

45.name: Panique
45.description: After an elderly maid is murdered, opinions are manipulated, evidence is planted, violence erupts, and panic ensues.

46.name: Angel on My Shoulder
46.description: The Devil arranges for a deceased gangster to return to Earth as a well-respected judge to make up for his previous life.

47.name: Black Angel
47.description: When Kirk Bennett is convicted of a singer's murder, his wife tries to prove him innocent...aided by the victim's ex-husband.

48.name: A Stolen Life
48.description: When a woman's twin sister is drowned, she assumes her identity in order to be close to the man she feels her sister took from her years before.

49.name: The Jolson Story
49.description: This movie shows the idealized career of the singer Al Jolson, a little Jewish boy who goes against the will of his father in order to be in showbiz. He becomes a star, falls in love with a...                See full summary »

50.name: The Verdict
50.description: After an innocent man is executed in a case he was responsible for, a Scotland Yard superintendent finds himself investigating the murder of his key witness.
